Corporate Recruiter currently supporting hiring teams on a variety of roles within Infrastructure Engineering for Salesforce.-Software Engineering / Infrastructure Engineering-Site Reliability / Service Management-Capacity Planning-Strategy & Business OperationsPlease visit our careers section on our website at http://www.salesforce.com/company/careers/ to read the full job descriptions.

-Managed hiring for optionsXpress in downtown Chicago, as well as the Branch Network for Schwab in the Midwest and Great Lakes Region-Talent Acquisition team member for Charles Schwab/optionsXpress who was responsible for recruiting within:-optionsXpress-Application development/technology architecture-Schwab’s branch network, sales/business development-Operations, supervision and controls-Options trading and programming, trading & client service, futures, derivatives trading-Client experience, integration & strategy, programs, international-Signature services and product management

-Responsible for on-site vendor coordination of Northern Trust, and their IT suppliers-Work with Northern Trust partners in Global Procurement.-Educate users and enforce policies/procedures; daily supplier management -Enforcement of SLA's, conduct Quarterly Business Reviews, contract negotiations-Develop strategies and best-in-class solutions focused on managing the key components of the employee life-cycle; Expertise in Beeline's Enterprise VMS-Providing functionality to streamline, centralize, monitor and control staffing and talent acquisition activities within an enterprise

-Pre-screened candidates, which includes preliminary phone and in-person interviews, administering technical tests, salary negotiations and checking professional references-Ensured quality control of candidates provided to clients through drug screens, criminal background checks, and credit checks for large-scale government or financial clients.-Ran a Full-Desk and clients served were specific to Master Service Providers and Vendor Management System accounts; business development & delivery-Maintained customer relations utilizing my program management skills and team concept to achieve daily, weekly, monthly and quarterly results.

-Responsible for delivery of staff augmentation for clients in the Chicagoland area-Managed a team of 10 recruiters specializing in IT professionals-Built customer centric relationships with clientele and/or business partners to cultivate a recruitment culture and drive hiring initiatives-Assisted with the development and implementation of recruitment policies, procedures, forms, strategies and consistent use of the Applicant Tracking System (Bullhorn)
Hansen Leadership Award Recipient (2002), All Conference (GPAC) - Collegiate Football, VP of Student Congress, Board Member of Doane Ambassadors

Jobs For Youth/Chicago has a non-for-profit organization that helped young men and women from low-income families become a part of the economic mainstream; and, in the process, provides the business community with motivated job-ready workers. Jobs For Youth was a free program for teens and young adults ages 17 to 24.

Year Up envisions a future in which every urban young adult will have access to the education, experiences, and guidance required to realize his or her true potential.Our mission is to close the Opportunity Divide by providing urban young adults with the skills, experience, and support that will empower them to reach their potential through professional careers and higher education.
